description.narrative: The innovationXchange seeks to capitalise on the expertise of new partners, catalyse innovative approaches to international development, maximise returns on Australian Official Development Assistance (ODA) and ensure sustainability by supporting market-driven solutions. The Google Impact Challenge Technology Against Poverty Prize is a $500,000 grant to up to four organisations as part of the Google Impact Challenge 2016. The prize encourages non-profits registered in Australia to explore new ways of delivering social impact internationally, using technology. innovationXchange's partnership with Google also supports the social impact participation of new, major technology player in Australia’s primary region of strategic interest, the Asia-Pacific.
